name: FilterBounce Email Verifier
author: Fresent

sections.description:
FilterBounce Email Verifier is your shield against invalid emails. It integrates seamlessly with popular WordPress forms. Say goodbye to spam registrations and hello to cleaner email lists!

Key Features:
– Real-time email verification.
– Form validation for emails.
– Detects invalid, temporary, spamtrap, disposable, role and catch-all addresses
– All email providers for business/professional emails supported.
– Works with most WordPress forms.
– GDPR compliant.

Supported WordPress Forms:
– WPForms
– HappyForms
– Ninja Forms
– Fluent Forms
– Gravity Form
– Mail Mint Form
– Contact Form 7
– Elementor Forms
– Forminator Forms
– Formiddable Form
– WordPress Comment Form
– WooCommerce Checkout Form
– Contact Form by BestWebSoft
– Default WordPress Registration Form
– Support for more forms will be added

Please visit https://filterbounce.com/ for detailed list of features and support.

Third-Party Service Usage

This plugin uses the Filter Bounce’s API service (https://filterbounce.com) to verify emails.
API calls are made to Filter Bounce’s servers, to verify email addresses using the below endpoint.

API Endpoint: https://filterbounce.com/api/v1/

By installing and activating this plugin, you are providing consent to the transmission of email addresses to above URLs for the email verication purpose.

We’re committed to your privacy as:

  • Emails are deleted after 15 days
  • We never use emails for marketing
  • All data is encrypted

The use of the FilterBounce Email Verifier service is subject to Fresent’s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, available at:

Terms of Service: https://fresent.com/terms/
Privacy Policy: https://fresent.com/privacy/

We encourage you to review above terms to understand how Filter Bounce handles and protects your data.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin in WordPress.
  3. Configure as required from Filter Bounce’s settings menu.
sections.faq:
How does it work?

When a user submits a form, we check their email address instantly. No emails are sent during verification.

What if I run out of credits?

No worries! Your forms will function normally, accepting all email addresses. However, no email submissions will be validated.

Is it GDPR compliant?

Absolutely. We encrypt all data and delete it after 15 days.

short_description: Verifies email addresses in real-time during form submissions to prevent invalid, disposable, temporary, catch-all, free or spamtrap email addresses.
